# Load Data 
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
houseTC_final <- read_csv("../Source/houseTC_final.csv")
```

# Variable Names
```{r}
names(houseTC_final)
```

# Feature Engineering

* `tom` = Time on Market
* `pdiff` = Price Difference
* `pdiff_perc` = Price Difference in Percentage 
* `pdiff_np` = Factored variable of `1` = positive `pdiff`, `2` = negative `pdiff`, `3` = 0 `pdiff`

```{r warning = FALSE, message=FALSE}
tem <- houseTC_final %>%
  mutate(tom = soldatdate - listedatdate,
         prdiff = soldatpr - listedatpr,
         prdiff_perc = (soldatpr - listedatpr)/listedatpr,
         prdiff_np = as.factor(ifelse(prdiff > 0, 1, 
                            ifelse(prdiff < 0, 2,
                                   ifelse(prdiff == 0, 3, 5)))))
```


## Inspect Variables

### `tom`
```{r}
tem %>%
  arrange(desc(tom))
tem %>%
  arrange(tom)
max(tem$tom)
min(tem$tom)
mean(tem$tom)
median(tem$tom)
```

### `tom` by city
```{r}
# Saint Paul
stp <- tem %>%
  filter(city == "Saint Paul") %>%
  arrange(desc(tom))
stp %>%
  filter(city == "Saint Paul") %>%
  arrange(tom)
max(stp$tom)
min(stp$tom)
mean(stp$tom)
median(stp$tom)

# Minneapolis
min <- tem %>%
  filter(city == "Minneapolis") %>%
  arrange(desc(tom))
min %>%
  filter(city == "Minneapolis") %>%
  arrange(tom)
max(min$tom)
min(min$tom)
mean(min$tom)
median(min$tom)

table(tem$city)
```

### `prdiff_np`
```{r}
table(tem$prdiff_np)
```

```{r warning = FALSE, message=FALSE}

  labs(title = "Short, Long Sold at Price & Time on Market")
```
